attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for all bars and clubs to have metal detectors
attributes.additional_details: Because too many people are being killed because of knife crime in large venues, clubs, bars and pubs. This cannot continue. Additional security needs to be put in place to ensure people are safe when enjoying themselves with friends. No one deserves to not come home after a night out.
attributes.background: Make it a legal requirement to have proper security and metal detectors for all bars, clubs, pubs and large venues

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627132
